node.title: Green Edge
node.excerpt: Creating a decentralised internet that is inherently equal, sustainable, private and secure.

node.title: Your November 22 Titan Update
node.excerpt: This week, we’re covering shipping, compensation for the unexpected 3Node configuration issue, upgrades to our process, expanding support, & more.

node.title: Update on the 1st Grid Enhancement Proposal

node.title: Grid V2 to V3 Migration Update
node.excerpt: Since we are now live on TF Grid 3.0, it is important that all farmers who are still on Grid 2.x migrate their farms to the newest mainnet.

node.title: Your Mid November Titan Update
node.excerpt: We’ve shipped 90% of all European orders that were placed up until early November, and later this month, we’ll begin shipping to the Americas.

node.title: Q2 3Node Batch is Sold Out! Q3 Pre-registration is Live!

node.title: Presenting the new Explorer UI for Grid 3.x
node.excerpt: The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.

node.title: How ThreeFold Can Truly Decentralize Blockchain
node.excerpt: Is a blockchain truly decentralized if it is being hosted on a centralized solution? We say, no.

node.title: Decentralizing the Internet
node.excerpt: In this article, we discuss the general concept of a ‘decentralized grid’ and how anyone can plug-in capacity to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Building the Future We Want to Live In – A Four Step Journey
node.excerpt: Driven by our planet-first, people-first philosophy, the ThreeFold movement is shaping the world we want to live in and laying the foundation for an open, inclusive and abundance-based future.

node.title: Farming – A Greener Alternative to Crypto Mining
node.excerpt: ThreeFold Farming is about so much more than crypto mining. It's a decentralized, energy-efficient and meaningful alternative.

node.title: Welcome to the Internet of Internets
node.excerpt: Together, we’re building our own future through the Internet of Internets – decentralized, open, inclusive, regenerative, and resilient.

node.title: How to stop the Internet from Gobbling the World’s Energy
node.excerpt: Oftentimes, the Internet’s significant energy consumption and climate impacts go unnoticed. At ThreeFold, we're leading the way by working on energy-efficient and sustainable solutions for the Internet.

node.title: We Need a More Inclusive Internet
node.excerpt: Today we are working with partners in the clean energy and network / connectivity to build the solutions that are needed to provide fair and uninterrupted internet access with all corners of the world.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: Peer-to-Peer Overcomes Web3 Challenges
node.excerpt: The promise of Web3 is tremendous, but there are clear limitations to overcome. How? Peer-to-peer systems and blockchains, side by side. The best of both worlds.

node.title: Planting the Seeds: ThreeFold's Plans to Regenerate the Planet
node.excerpt: We believe our planet needs regenerative solutions at a large scale. ThreeFold and Take Action Global (TAG) are on a mission to regenerate the planet together.

node.title: How ThreeFold Will Give Internet to 43% of the World’s Population
node.excerpt: Proper access to the Internet helps to protect people’s freedom of speech and thought, as well as access to knowledge and information.

node.title: How ThreeFold offers Data Sovereignty
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is building the engine for an Internet where people can finally be data sovereign.

node.title: ThreeFold’s Planet Positive Plan
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is taking not just a sustainable approach, we’re setting the plan for a planet positive Internet.

node.title: ThreeFold Weekly! June 15th, 2022 (Vol 21)
node.excerpt: Welcome to the 21st edition of ThreeFold Weekly. It’s been a big week! Let’s take a quick look at the latest happenings within the ThreeFold universe.

node.title: What Is Peer-to-Peer and Why Is It so Important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements)..

node.title: Why Anyone Should Consider Becoming A (ThreeFold) Farmer
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation is changing the way how "we" as a whole approach the internet and its underlying technology..
